text:
CTAs don’t get assigned a unique ID when added to the page
if you include the same CTA multiple times you get an accessibility issue as IDs should be unique
I guess the work around in this case would be to clone a CTA for as many unique instances as you need to use it. Then the trade-off might be that this creates more work for reporting...
Yeah CTA’s are already clunky enough without having to go through any more faff. The new CTA’s are such an awful experience too

You could always set up your own version of "CTAs" manually by creating a customizable button module, use {{ name }} for the ID, and configure a HubSpot custom behavioral event applied to the button click! that seems like more hassle than working through the clunk..
Also behavioral events require a certain subscription
but it’s probably a better solution
